meanings.def: a person who competes in sports
examples: Depression is thought to be common among elite athletes.
a training facility for amateur and professional athletes
Her company is designing part of the Olympic athletes' village.
The athletes are training hard for the Olympics.
one of the greatest athletes of all time
She's a superbly gifted all-round athlete.

meanings.def: a person who competes in sports such as running, jumping and throwing
examples: He played baseball and basketball and excelled as a track athlete.
She was hailed as the greatest female athlete in the world.

meanings.def: a person who is good at sports and physical exercise
